Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Customs Classification Type Code (importClassificationTypeCode) equals 'INTRASTAT', then Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) must have exactly 8 digits.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If any attributes in class microbiologicalInformation is provided, then the attribute microbiologicalOrganismCode must be provided.
Rule.Message: If attribute XY (any attribute of class microbiologicalInformation) is provided, therefore microbiologicalOrganismCode SHALL be populated

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('250' (France)) then codes ('NON_EU' or 'D_A') cannot be used for any countryCode attribute.
Rule.Message: The "NON_EU' and 'D_A' country codes are not usable if the target market is 'France'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarket/countryCode in ('276' Germany or '040' Austria) and catchAreaCode is used then catchAreaCode SHALL NOT be in ('27', '37').
Rule.Message: For DE, AT the FAO catch zones of 27, 37 are not valid, please use the sub areas or divisions for these zones.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: Code value 'NON_EU' (Non European Union) shall not be used with /catalogue_item_notification:catalogueItemNotificationMessage/transaction/documentCommand/catalogue_item_notification:catalogueItemNotification/catalogueItem/tradeItem/targetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode, /catalogue_item_publication:catalogueItemPublicationMessage/transaction/documentCommand/catalogue_item_publication:catalogueItemPublication/publishToTargetMarket/targetMarketcountryCode, /catalogue_item_publication:catalogueItemPublicationMessage/transaction/documentCommand/catalogue_item_publication:catalogueItemPublication/catalogueItemReference/targetMarketCountryCode, /request_for_catalogue_item_notification:requestForCatalogueItemNotificationMessage/transaction/documentCommand/request_for_catalogue_item_notification:requestForCatalogueItemNotification/targetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode, /catalogue_item_subscription:catalogueItemSubscriptionMessage/transaction/documentCommand/catalogue_item_subscription:catalogueItemSubscription/targetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode
Rule.Message: Code value 'NON_EU' was invalidly used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If nutritionalProgramCode equals '8' (Nutri-Score) and nutritionalProgramStatusCode does not equal 'NOT_REGISTERED' then nutritionalScore SHALL be used and nutritionalScore SHALL equal ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E' or 'EXEMPT').
Rule.Message: Acceptable values for the Nutri-Score program are ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E' or 'EXEMPT').

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: nutritionalProgramIngredientMeasurement shall only be used if nutritionalProgramIngredientTypeCode is used.
Rule.Message: nutritionalProgramIngredientTypecode is not used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one iteration of nutritionalProgramIngredientMeasurement per @measurementUnitCode
Rule.Message: nutritionalProgramIngredientMeasurement is repeatable for @measurementUnitCode only.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one iteration of materialStatement per @languageCode.
Rule.Message: materialStatement is repeatable for @languageCode only.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If (targetMarketcountrycode = '008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine) or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and If catchAreaCode is used and PlaceOfItemActivityModule/../productActivityTypeCode equals 'CATCH_ZONE', then catchAreaCode shall equal PlaceOfItemActivityModule/../productActivityRegionZoneCodeReference/enumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue
Rule.Message: If catchAreaCode is used and PlaceOfItemActivityModule/../productActivityTypeCode equals 'CATCH_ZONE', then catchAreaCode shall equal PlaceOfItemActivityModule/../productActivityRegionZoneCodeReference/enumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue for the following countries: '008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), '860' (Uzbekistan)

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: IF targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and HandlingInstructionsCodeReference equals ‘OTC’ (Temperature Control), then temperatureQualifierCode SHALL be used and equal ('STORAGE_HANDLING' or 'TRANSPORTATION') AND maximumTemperature and minimumTemperature SHALL be used per temperatureQualifierCode.
Rule.Message: In Sweden for items both maximumTemperature & minimumTemperature are required.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and regulationTypeCode equals 'BIOCIDE_REGULATION', then regulationLevelCodeReference SHALL be populated.
Rule.Message: For biocide regulation, at least one regulationLevelCodeReference shall be provided for the product with the biocide type.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If dietTypeCode equals ’PESCATARIAN’ and dietTypeSubcode is used, then dietTypeSubcode SHALL be a value in (‘PESCA’, ‘LACTO_OVO_PESCA’, 'LACTO_PESCA’).
Rule.Message: The dietTypeSubcodeCode is not valid for a Pescatarian diet.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If dietTypeCode equals ’VEGETARIAN’ and dietTypeSubcode is used and targetMarketCountryCode is not '840' (US), then dietTypeSubcode SHALL be a value in (‘OVO’, ‘LACTO ‘, ‘LACTO_OVO’).
Rule.Message: The dietTypeSubcodeCode is not valid for a Vegetarian diet.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketcountrycode = ('840' (US)) and dietTypeCode equals ’VEGETARIAN’ and dietTypeSubcode is used, then dietTypeSubcode SHALL be a value in (‘OVO’, ‘LACTO ‘, ‘LACTO_OVO’, ‘PESCA’, ‘LACTO_OVO_PESCA’ or 'LACTO_PESCA’).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the dietTypeSubCode <dietTypeSubCode> is not valid for a Vegetarian diet.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If dietTypeCode equals ’KOSHER’ and dietTypeSubcode is used, then dietTypeSubcode SHALL be a value in (‘MEAT’, ’FISH’, ‘DAIRY’, ‘PAREVE’, 'KOSHER_FOR_PASSOVER', ‘MEAT_FOR_PASSOVER’, ‘FISH_FOR_PASSOVER’, ‘DAIRY_FOR_PASSOVER’, ‘PAREVE_FOR_PASSOVER’, ‘DE’, ‘MEVUSHAL’, ‘KOSHER_FOR_PASSOVER_MEVUSHAL’).
Rule.Message: The dietTypeSubcodeCode is not valid for a Kosher diet.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one iteration of batteryCapacity per @measurementCode
Rule.Message: Multiple values for batteryCapacity for the same @measurementCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one iteration of batteryVoltage per @measurementCode
Rule.Message: Multiple values for batteryVoltage for the same @measurementCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one iteration of tradeItemVariantStatement per @languageCode.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for tradeItemVariantStatement for the same @languageCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one iteration of consumerRecyclingInstructions per @languageCode.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for consumerRecyclingInstructions for the same @languageCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage is used then the value SHALL be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100
Rule.Message: If populated, packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage must be greater than or equal to 0 and smaller than or equal to 100.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If packagingLabellingCoveragePercentage is used then the value SHALL be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100
Rule.Message: If populated, packagingLabellingCoveragePercentage must be greater than or equal to 0 and smaller than or equal to 100.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and an attribute with NonBinaryLogicEnumeration data type is used, then its value SHALL NOT equal 'UNSPECIFIED’.
Rule.Message: For the French target market, the value "UNSPECIFIED" is not accepted for {specifiy the attribute} using the NonBinaryLogicEnumeration data type.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and NutrientDetail sub-class is used then all nutrientTypeCode values SHALL be unique within the same NutrientHeader class.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('208' (Denmark), '250' (France) or '752' (Sweden)) and NutrientDetail sub-class is used, then all nutrientTypeCode values shall be unique within the same NutrientHeader class.
Rule.Message:
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Nutrient Detail sub-class is used, then Nutrient Code (nutrientTypeCode) must be unique within the same Nutrient Header class.
If NutrientDetail sub-class is used, then all nutrientTypeCode values shall be unique within the same NutrientHeader class.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and foodAndBeverageIngredientModule/../productActivityTypeCode equals 'CATCH_ZONE’ then foodAndBeverageIngredientModule/../productActivityRegionZoneCodeReference/enumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue SHALL NOT be in ('27', '37’).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the FAO catch zones 27 (Atlantic, Northeast) and 37 (Mediterranean and Black Sea) are not valid, please use the sub areas or divisions for these zones.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and placeOfItemActivityModule/../productActivityTypeCode equals 'CATCH_ZONE' then placeOfItemActivityModule/../productActivityRegionZoneCodeReference/enumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue SHALL NOT be in ('27', '37').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the FAO catch zones 27 (Atlantic, Northeast) and 37 (Mediterranean and Black Sea) are not valid, please use the sub areas or divisions for these zones.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> then isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit SHALL equal 'true' for at least one trade item in the hierarchy.
If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia), '554' (New Zealand), '250' (France), or '752' (Sweden)) then isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit SHALL be 'true' for at least one trade item in a Catalogue Item Notification Message.
Rule.Message: One or more of the GTINs in each hierarchy must be marked as an INVOICE UNIT

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> then isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit SHALL be used.
If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia), '554' (New Zealand), '250' (France), or '752' Sweden)) then isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit must be populated for the trade item.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode equals '85' then additionalTradeItemClassificationCodeValue SHALL equal (‘EU_CLASS_I’, ‘EU_CLASS_IIA’, ‘EU_CLASS_IIB’, ‘EU_CLASS_III’, ‘IVDD_ANNEX_II_LIST_A’, ‘IVDD_ANNEX_II_LIST_B’, ‘IVDD_DEVICES_SELF_TESTING’, ‘IVDD_GENERAL’, or 'AIMDD')
Rule.Message: additionalTradeItemClassificationCodeValue is incorrect. For additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode '85' shall be one of these values (‘EU_CLASS_I’, ‘EU_CLASS_IIA’, ‘EU_CLASS_IIB’, ‘EU_CLASS_III’, ‘IVDD_ANNEX_II_LIST_A’, ‘IVDD_ANNEX_II_LIST_B’, ‘IVDD_DEVICES_SELF_TESTING’, ‘IVDD_GENERAL’, 'AIMDD')

Rule.Name: SearchResult
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of languageSpecificPartyName for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for languageSpecificPartyName for the same language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of lightBulbWarmUpTime for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for lightBulbWarmUpTime for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of minimumColourTemperaturefor each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for minimumColourTemperature for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of maximumColourTemperature for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for maximumColourTemperature for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of declaredPower for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for declaredPower for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of equivalentLightBulbPower for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for equivalentLightBulbPower for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of recallPrecision for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for recallPrecision for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of clinicalSizeValueMaximum for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for clinicalSizeValueMaximum for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of globalModelDescription for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for globalModelDescription for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of nonFoodIngredientName for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for nonFoodIngredientName for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of alcoholBeverageAge for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for alcoholBeverageAge for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of productTexturalCharacteristics for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for productTexturalCharacteristics for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of imitationOrSubstituteFor for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for imitationOrSubstituteFor for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of additionalTradeItemDimensions/diameter for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for additionalTradeItemDimensions/diameter for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (nutrientTypeCode, quantityContained, or measurementPrecisionCode) is used then (nutrientTypeCode, quantityContained and measurementPrecisionCode) SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if any of the following attributes is provided, then all three must be provided: Nutrient Code (nutrientTypeCode), Nutrient Quantity (quantityContained), Nutrient Value Precision Code (measurementPrecisionCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals 'FALSE' or is not used) then quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem SHALL be greater than 0 (zero).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' and Irregularly Configured Pallet Indicator (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly) equals 'FALSE' or is not used, then Number of Layers per GTIN (quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem) must be used and greater than zero.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and areBatteriesRequired equals 'true' then areBatteriesIncluded SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if batteries are required for the trade item (areBatteriesRequired = 'true’), then areBatteriesIncluded must be provided.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and Packaging class or sub-classes are used then packagingTypeCode SHALL be used in each iteration of the Packaging class.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if any of the attributes from class Packaging is provided, then attribute packagingTypeCode must be provided (in each iteration of the class).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet is used or quantityOfLayersPerPallet is used or quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used) then at least one iteration of platformTypeCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if any of the following attributes is provided, then platformTypeCode must be provided: quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet, quantityOfLayersPerPallet or quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (gpcCategoryCode is in GPC Segment '50000000' (Food/Beverage) or gpcCategoryCode equals ('10000467' (Vitamins/Minerals), '10000468' (Nutritional Supplements) or '10000651' (Vitamins/Minerals/Nutritional Supplements Variety Packs))) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and (preliminaryItemStatusCode equals 'FINAL' or is not used) then regulatedProductName SHALL be used.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('203' (Czech Republic), 246' (Finland), or '703' (Slovakia)) and ((gpcCategoryCode equals a brick value from segment '50000000' excluding brick values from family '50210000') or (gpcCategoryCode equals '10000467', '10000468' or '10000651')) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true' and (preliminaryItemStatusCode is not used or equals 'FINAL’), then regulatedProductName SHALL be used.
Rule.Message:
For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) equals <gpcCategoryCode> <gpcCategoryName>, Regulated Product Name (regulatedProductName) must be provided for all consumer units (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals to 'true'). If the product has a legal exception and does not have a Regulated Product Name, please provide a copy of Product Type Description (functionalName) as the Regulated Product Name.
Regulated Product Name (regulatedProductName) must be provided for all consumer units (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true') from this Global Product Category Code <<gpcCategoryCode>> <<gpcCategoryName>>. If the product has a legal exception and does not have a Regulated Product Name (regulatedProductName), please provide (copy) of Product Type Description (functionalName).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> then for each iteration of TradeItemStacking class if (stackingFactorTypeCode is used or stackingFactor is used) then stackingFactorTypeCode SHALL be used and stackingFactor SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Stacking Factor Type Code (stackingFactorTypeCode) and Stacking Factor (stackingFactor) must be used together in the same iteration.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode is equal to 'ZERO_SUPPRESSED_GTIN', then the first digit of gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue SHALL equal '0'.
Rule.Message: Zero Suppressed GTINs provided as a GS1 Trade Key shall begin with a "0".

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode is equal to 'ZERO_SUPPRESSED_GTIN', then the associated gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue value SHALL be 8 digits and have a valid check digit.
Rule.Message: Zero Suppressed GTINs provided as a GS1 Trade Item Key shall be eight digits with a valid check digit.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of consumerSalesConditionMaximumAmount for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for consumerSalesConditionMaximumAmount for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of microbiologicalOrganismMinimumValue for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for microbiologicalOrganismMinimumValue for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of bitternessOfBeerMeasurement for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for bitternessOfBeerMeasurement for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationStateCode is used then at least one iteration of preparationStateCode SHALL equal to 'PREPARED' or 'UNPREPARED'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Nutritional Preparation Code (preparationStateCode) must equal 'PREPARED' or 'UNPREPARED'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and nutrientDetail/measurementPrecisionCode is used, then nutrientDetail/measurementPrecisionCode SHALL equal 'APPROXIMATELY' or 'LESS_THAN'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> Nutrient Value Precision Code (measurementPrecisionCode) shall be 'APPROXIMATELY' or 'LESS_THAN'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('056' (Belgium), '442' (Luxembourg), '528' (Netherlands)) and levelOfContainmentCode is used, then levelOfContainmentCode SHALL equal one of the following values: 'CONTAINS', 'FREE_FROM' or 'MAY_CONTAIN'.
Rule.Message: The value for level of containment code is not valid; the allowed values are 'CONTAINS', 'FREE_FROM', 'MAY_CONTAIN' for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and drainedWeight is used, then the drainedWeight unit of measurement SHALL equal one of the following values: 'KGM' or 'GRM'.
Rule.Message: The drained weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM' or 'GRM' for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and nutrientTypeCode is used with one of the values: 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'FAMSCIS', 'FAPUCIS', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'FIBTG', 'SUGAR-', 'SALTEQ', 'POLYL' or 'STARCH', then the value of quantityContained/@unitOfMeasurement SHALL equal 'GRM'.
Rule.Message: The quantity contained unit of measurement shall be 'GRM' in case the nutrient type code is 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'FAMSCIS', 'FAPUCIS', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'FIBTG', 'SALTEQ', 'SUGAR-', 'POLYL' or 'STARCH' for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If dailyValueIntakePercent is used, then the value of dailyValueIntakePercent SHALL equal greater than or equal to 0 (zero).
Rule.Message: The value of percentage of daily value intake shall be greater than or equal to 0 (zero).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and quantityOfChildren equals '1' on every level of the item hierarchy (except for the level where isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true’) and percentageOfAlcoholByVolume is used, then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume SHALL equal the same value in all levels of the item hierarchy where percentageOfAlcoholByVolume is used.
Rule.Message: The percentage of alcohol by volume shall have the same value in all levels of this hierarchy for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and quantityOfChildren equals 1 on each level of the item hierarchy (except for the level where isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true’) and degreeOfOriginalWort is used, then degreeOfOriginalWort SHALL equal the same value in all levels of the item hierarchy where degreeOfOriginalWort is used.
Rule.Message: The degree of original wort shall have the same value in all levels of this hierarchy for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and one instance of preparationStateCode equals 'PREPARED' and at least one nutrientTypeCode is used, then there SHALL be at least one instance of preparationInstructions with languageCode equal to 'nl'.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals '528' (the Netherlands) and one instance of preparationStateCode equals 'PREPARED' and at least one nutrientTypeCode is used, then there SHALL be at least one instance of preparationInstructions with languageCode equal to 'nl'.
Rule.Message: An instance of preparation instructions with the language code 'nl' shall be filled out in case preparation state code is filled out with 'PREPARED' and at least one nutrient type code is filled out.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '528' (the Netherlands) and regulatedProductName is used and gpcCategoryCode equals '10005786, then there SHALL be at least one instance of provenanceStatement with languageCode equal to 'nl'.
Rule.Message: An instance of provenance statement with the language code 'nl' shall be filled out for target market Netherlands in case regulatory product name is filled out and the gpc category code equals 10005786.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and nutrientTypeCode is used, then quantityContained SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: You should fill out the field quantity contained because you used the field nutrient type code for this target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and (nutrientBasisQuantity equals 100 GRM, 100 MLT, 1000 MLT or 1 LTR) and dailyValueIntakePercent is used and (nutrientTypeCode is used with one of the values: 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'ENER-', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'SUGAR-' or 'SALTEQ'), then dailyValueIntakeReference SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: Daily value intake reference shall be filled out in case the nutrient type code equals 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'ENER-', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'SUGAR-' or 'SALTEQ' and daily value intake percent is filled out for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and one instance of nutrientTypeCode is equal to 'FASAT', then there SHALL be also one instance of nutrientTypeCode with the value 'FAT' within the same nutrientHeader.
Rule.Message: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FASAT', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and one instance of nutrientTypeCode equals 'FAMSCIS', then there SHALL be also one instance of nutrientTypeCode with the value 'FAT' within the same nutrientHeader.
Rule.Message: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAMSCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and one instance of nutrientTypeCode equals 'FAPUCIS', then there SHALL be also one instance of nutrientTypeCode with the value 'FAT' within the same nutrientHeader.
Rule.Message: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAPUCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and one instance of nutrientTypeCode equals 'STARCH', then there SHALL be also one instance of nutrientTypeCode with the value 'CHOAVL' within the same nutrientHeader.
Rule.Message: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'STARCH', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' within the same group, for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and one instance of nutrientTypeCode equals 'POLYL', then there SHALL be also one instance of nutrientTypeCode with the value 'CHOAVL' within the same nutrientHeader.
Rule.Message: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'POLYL', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL’ within the same group, for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and (nutrientBasisQuantity equals '100' GRM, '100' MLT, '1000' MLT or '1' LTR) and one instance of nutrientTypeCode equals 'SUGAR-', then there SHALL be also one instance of nutrientTypeCode with the value 'CHOAVL' within the same nutrientHeader.
Rule.Message: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'SUGAR-’, then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' for the legally required nutritional table within the same group, for the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '528' (the Netherlands) and if isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true’ and (nutrientTypeCode is used with 'NA' and quantityContained is greater than or equal to 0.1 GRM and if measurementPrecisionCode is NOT equal to 'LESS_THAN') and if (nutrientTypeCode is used with 'SALTEQ' and if measurementPrecisionCode is NOT equal to 'LESS_THAN' and quantityContained is greater than or equal to 0.1 GRM), then quantityContained of nutrientTypeCode 'NA' multiplied by 2.5, SHALL be less than 1.1 times and greater than 0.9 times quantityContained of nutrientTypeCode 'SALTEQ’.
Rule.Message: The amount of nutrient type code 'NA' multiplied by 2.5 may not deviate more than 10% from the amount of nutrient type code SALTEQ with identical unit of measure in case of consumer units and a measurementPrecisionCode not equal to 'LESS_THAN' for target market Netherlands.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and gpcCategoryCode is in GPC Segment '92000000' then isPackagingMarkedReturnable SHALL NOT equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) is in GPC Segment '92000000' (Storage/Haulage Containers), then Packaging Marked Returnable Indicator (isPackagingMarkedReturnable) must not be 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '528' (Netherlands) and the value of gpcCategoryCode equals one of the bricks in GPC families ('50250000', '50260000' or '50350000') and packagingTypeCode is not equal to 'X11' or 'NE', then isPackagingMarkedReturnable SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: Is packaging marked returnable shall be populated for the target market in case of packed fresh fruits and vegetables.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If drainedWeight is used, then drainedWeight SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: Drained weight shall be greater than 0 (zero).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If packagingTypeCode equals 'NE', then drainedWeight SHALL NOT be used.
Rule.Message: Drained weight shall not be used, if packaging type code is equal to 'NE' (Not packed).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If gpcCategoryCode is a brick from the segment '50000000' and numberOfSmallestUnitsPerPackage is used, then numberOfSmallestUnitsPerPackage SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: Number of smallest units per package shall be greater than 0 (zero).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and nutrientTypeCode is used, then nutrientTypeCode SHALL NOT equal to 'ENERA', 'NACL', 'SUGAR', 'CHO-' and 'FIB-'.
Rule.Message: The <nutrientTypeCode> nutrient type code used is not allowed in the target market.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '752' (Sweden), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and (nutrientBasisQuantity equals 100 and nutrientBasisQuantity /@measuremenrUnitCode equals 'GRM') and (nutrientTypeCode equals 'FAT' and quantityContained/UoM is used with 'GRM') and (nutrientTypeCode is used with 'PRO-' and quantityContained/@measuremenrUnitCode equals 'GRM') and (nutrientTypeCode equals 'CHOAVL' and quantityContained/@measuremenrUnitCode equals 'GRM'), then the sum of the corresponding quantityContained values SHALL be less than 102 gram per nutrientHeader.
Rule.Message: The sum of the quantity contained values for nutrient type codes 'FAT', 'PRO-' and 'CHOAVL' exceeds 100 gram.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '528' (Netherlands) and if preparationStateCode is used and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true', then regulatedProductName (with languageCode 'nl') SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: If preparation state code is used, then regulated product name should be used as well for consumer units.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If quantityOfBatteriesBuiltIn is used, then quantityOfBatteriesBuiltIn SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For batteries the field quantity of batteries built-in shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If quantity of batteries built in is not required, please do not populate.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If quantityOfBatteriesIncluded is used then quantityOfBatteriesIncluded SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For batteries the field quantity of batteries included shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not included, please do not populate.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If quantityOfBatteriesRequired is used, then quantityOfBatteriesRequired SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For batteries the field quantity of batteries required shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not required, please do not populate.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If batteryWeight is used, then batteryWeight SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For batteries the field Battery weight shall be greater than 0 (zero), if used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode not ('203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '250' (France), ‘840’ (US), ‘104‘ (Myanmar) or ‘430’ (Liberia)) and batteryWeight is used, then batteryWeight/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal ('KGM’, 'GRM’ or ‘MGM’).
Rule.Message: Battery weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM', 'GRM' or 'MGM'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If NutrientDetail class is used, then all combinations of nutrientTypeCode and quantityContained/@measurementUnitCode values shall be unique within the same NutrientHeader class.
Rule.Message: For a Nutrient Header class, the Nutrient <nutrientTypeCode> and Unit of Measure <quantityContained/@measurementUnitCode> must be unique.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If NutrientDetail class is used, then all combinations of nutrientTypeCode and measurementPrecisionCode values SHALL be unique within the same NutrientHeader class.
Rule.Message: For a Nutrient Header class, the Nutrient <nutrientTypeCode> and Measurement Precision Code <measurementPrecisionCode> must be unique.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If isTradeItemUDIDILevel=‘true’, then isTradeItemUDIDILevel SHALL equal ‘false’ or not used for all other tradeItem/gtin within the same hierarchy.
Rule.Message: Only one tradeItem/gtin within a hierarchy can have isTradeItemUDIDILevel set to 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If isTradeItemUnitOfUse =‘true’, then isTradeItemUnitOfUse SHALL equal ‘false’ or not used for all other tradeItem/gtin within the same hierarchy.
Rule.Message: Only one tradeItem/gtin within a hierarchy can have isTradeItemUnitOfUse set to ‘true’.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If specialItemCode does not equal 'DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT' and (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet and NonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight and tradeItemMeasurements/tradeItemWeight/grossWeight are used), then NonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight SHALL be greater than 96 % of quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet multiplied by tradeItemMeasurements/tradeItemWeight/grossWeight.
Rule.Message: If all of following three attributes are provided, then gross weight of a Non-GTIN Logistic Unit (NonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight) must be greater than 96 % of Trade Item’s Gross Weight (tradeItemMeasurements/tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) multiplied by the Quantity Of Trade Items Per Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If one instance of additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode equals '76' then all other instances of additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode SHALL NOT equal '76’.
Rule.Message: The attribute additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode with value ‘76’ EU Regulation (MDR/IVDR) Risk class is not repeatable.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If one instance of additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode equals '85' then all other instances of additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode SHALL NOT equal '85’.
Rule.Message: The attribute additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode with value ‘85’ EU Directive (MDD/AIMDD/IVDD) Risk class is not repeatable.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of depth for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for depth for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of grossWeight for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for grossWeight for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of height for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for height for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of width for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for width for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If nutritionalProgramCode equals '8' (Nutri-Score) and nutritionalProgramStatusCode equals ‘NOT_REGISTERED’ then nutritionalScore SHALL NOT be used.
Rule.Message: nutritionalScore shall not be used, if nutritionalProgramCode equals '8' (Nutri-Score) and nutritionalProgramStatusCode equals 'NOT_REGISTERED’.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and alcoholicBeverageSugarContent is used then associated alcoholicBeverageSugarContent/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'GL' (gram per litre).
Rule.Message: Invalid measurement unit for alcoholicBeverageSugarContent: <alcoholicBeverageSugarContent/@measurementUnitCode>. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, alcoholicBeverageSugarContent must have 'GL' (gram per litre) as the measurement unit.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and feedingInstructions is used then feedingInstructions SHALL be used with one of the iterations of feedingInstructions/@languageCode equal to 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feeding Instructions (feedingInstructions) must be supplied in Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('208' (Denmark) or 752' (Sweden)) then aDRDangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode SHALL NOT be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, invalid use of aDRDangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode. aDRDangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode has been deprecated. Use Dangerous Goods Limited Quantities Code (dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode) instead.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetConsumerUsageTypeCode is used THEN at least one of targetConsumerMinimumUsage or targetConsumerMaximumUsage SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: One or both of targetConsumerMinimumUsage or targetConsumerMaximumUsage is missing. You must supply one or both of these attributes if you use targetConsumerUsageTypeCode.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and gpcCategoryCode is in GPC Family '12010000' (Tobacco/Cannabis/Smoking Accessories) and gpcCategoryCode is not in GPC Brick ('10000303' (Smoking Accessories) or '10006730' (Electronic Cigarette Accessories)) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' then consumerSalesConditionCode SHALL be used.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and gpcCategoryCode is in: family '50210000' (Tobacco/Cannabis/Smoking Accessories) and gpcCategoryCode is not in: (brick '10000303' (Smoking Accessories) or brick '10006730' (Electronic Cigarette Accessories)) then consumerSalesConditionCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message:
Missing Consumer Sales Condition Code (consumerSalesConditionCode). For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the Consumer Sales Condition Code is required for tobacco products.
Missing consumerSalesConditionCode. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the attribute is required for tobacco products.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and shortTradeItemMarketingMessage is used then tradeItemMarketingMessage SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: tradeItemMarketingMessage is missing. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, it is not permitted to use shortTradeItemMarketingMessage without also using tradeItemMarketingMessage.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and (preliminaryItemStatusCode is not used or equals 'FINAL’) and allergen/levelOfContainmentCode equals 'CONTAINS' or 'MAY_CONTAIN' and Document Command equals 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then corresponding values for allergenTypeCode SHALL NOT be added or removed.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, it is not permitted to add or remove values in Allergen Type Code (allergenTypeCode) using a 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' Document Command. Changes to allergens require a new GTIN. Added value(s) = <added_value(s)>. Removed value(s) = <removed_value(s)>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage is used then packagingRawMaterialCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: packagingRawMaterialCode is missing. When packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage is used, packagingRawMaterialCode must also be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and sizeTypeCode or sizeDimension is used then sizeTypeCode and sizeDimension SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, sizeTypeCode or sizeDimension is missing. When one is used, the other must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If colourTemperature is used then associated @measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'KEL' (Kelvin).
Rule.Message: Invalid meaurement unit for colourTemperature: <colourTemperature/@measurementUnitCode>. colourTemperature must have 'KEL' (Kelvin) as the measurement unit.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and lightOutput is used then the associated @measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'B60' (Lumens per square metre) or 'LUX' (Lux).
Rule.Message: Invalid Meaurement unit for lightOutput: <lightOutput/@measurementUnitCode>. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, lightOutput must have 'B60' (Lumens per square metre) or 'LUX' (Lux) as the measurement unit.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and nutrientTypeCode is used then nutrientBasisQuantity and nutrientBasisQuantityTypeCode SHALL be used within the same NutrientHeader class.
Rule.Message: Nutrient Basis (nutrientBasisQuantity) and Nutrient Basis Type Code (nutrientBasisQuantityTypeCode) is missing. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Nutrient Code (nutrientTypeCode) is used then both Nutrient Basis (nutrientBasisQuantity) and Nutrient Basis Type Code (nutrientBasisQuantityTypeCode) must also be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and feedCompositionStatement is used then feedCompositionStatement SHALL be used with one of the iterations of feedCompositionStatement/@languageCode equal to 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feed Composition Statement (feedCompositionStatement) must be supplied in Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and feedAnalyticalConstituentsStatement is used then feedAnalyticalConstituentsStatement SHALL be used with one of the iterations of feedAnalyticalConstituentsStatement/@languageCode equal to 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feed Analytical Constituents Statement (feedAnalyticalConstituentsStatement) must be supplied in Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and feedAdditiveStatement is used then feedAdditiveStatement SHALL be used with one of the iterations of feedAdditiveStatement/@languageCode equal to 'sv' (Swedish).
If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and feedAdditiveStatement is used then feedAdditiveStatement SHALL be used with one of the iterations of feedAddititiveStatement/@languageCode equal to 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feed Additive Statement (feedAdditiveStatement) must be supplied in Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('250' (France)) and more than one instance of dutyFeeTaxInformation class has the same dutyFeeTaxTypeCode, then dutyFeeTaxEffectiveStartDateTime SHALL be used in all instances of the same dutyFeeTaxTypeCode.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and the same Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) cannot be repeated without having a corresponding start date (dutyFeeTaxEffectiveStartDateTime ).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('250' (France)) and more than one instance of dutyFeeTaxInformation class has the same dutyFeeTaxTypeCode, then there SHALL be only 1 instance for the same dutyFeeTaxTypeCode that may have dutyFeeTaxEffectiveEndDateTime not used and in all other instances dutyFeeTaxEffectiveEndDateTime SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and the same Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) cannot be repeated without having a corresponding end date (dutyFeeTaxEffectiveEndDateTime) except for the last instance.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and importClassificationTypeCode equals 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER', then the corresponding importClassificationValue SHALL have a value between 8 and 13 numeric characters in length.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Customs Classification Type Code (importClassificationTypeCode) equals 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER' then the corresponding Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) shall have a value 8 to 13 numeric characters long.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and isTradeItemADespatchUnit equals 'true' and (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals 'FALSE' or is not used) and platformTypeCode is used, then quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Pallet Type Code (platformTypeCode) is used, it is mandatory to provide a valid Number of Layers per GTIN (quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem) for a pallet.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and bracketQualifier class is used, then bracketSequenceNumber shall be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and bracketQualifier is used, then Bracket Sequence Number (bracketSequenceNumber) shall be used.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and bracketSequenceNumber is used then bracketSequenceNumber shall be unique for each bracketQualifier class within the same ItemPriceType class.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Bracket Sequence Number (bracketSequenceNumber) shall be unique within the same item price type class.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of meatPoultryCut for each languageCode.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for meatPoultryCut for each languageCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of minimumAmountOfAnimalProtein for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for minimumAmountOfAnimalProtein for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of tradeItemSustainabilityStatement for each languageCode.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for tradeItemSustainabilityStatement for each languageCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformation for each languageCode.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformation for each languageCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and (quantityOfChildren equals '1' or is not used) on all levels of the trade item hierarchy, then dutyFeeTaxRate, where used, SHALL equal the same value.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, invalid use of dutyFeeTaxRate. Values cannot differ across the trade item hierarchy when used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of packagingRecyclabilityValue for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for packagingRecyclabilityValue for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If (gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue is used or gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode is used) then gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue SHALL be used and gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: If GTIN for Point of Sale (gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue) or GTIN for Point of Sale Type Code (gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode) is used, then both shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'EQUIVALENT', then each iteration with referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique.
Rule.Message: When Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'EQUIVALENT', then each iteration with Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) SHALL be unique.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY', then each iteration with referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique.
Rule.Message: When Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY', then each iteration with Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) SHALL be unique.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If temperatureQualifierCode is used, then at least one other attribute in the TradeItemTemperatureInformation class SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: At least one other attribute in Trade Item Temperature Information class SHALL be used when Temperature Activity Code (temperatureQualifierCode) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If humidityQualifierCode is used, then at least one other attribute in the TradeItemHumidityInformation class SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: At least one other attribute in Trade Item Humidity Information class SHALL be used when humidityQualifierCode is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformationTypeCode is used, then compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformation SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: If Additional Legal Product Information Type Code (compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformationTypeCode) is used, then you SHALL use Additional Legal Product Information (compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformation).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode equals 'MARINE_FISHERY' then catchCountryCode SHALL NOT be used.
Rule.Message: Catch Country Code (catchCountryCode) may only be used when Fish Production Method Code (productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode) does not equal 'MARINE_FISHERY'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If catchCountryCode and catchAreaCode are used then catchAreaCode SHALL equal (’01’, ‘02’, ’03’, ’04’, ’05’, ’06’, ’07, or ’08’).
Rule.Message: Catch Country Code (catchCountryCode) may only be used when Catch Area Code (catchAreaCode) <catchAreaCode> is one of the inland water codes (’01’, ‘02’, ’03’, ’04’, ’05’, ’06’, ’07, or ’08’).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode equals ‘INLAND_FISHERY' and catchAreaCode is used then catchAreaCode SHALL equal (’01’, ‘02’, ’03’, ’04’, ’05’, ’06’, ’07, or ’08’).
Rule.Message: If Fish Production Method Code (productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode) equals 'INLAND_FISHERY', then Catch Area Code (catchAreaCode) <catchAreaCode> SHALL be one of the inland water codes (’01’, ‘02’, ’03’, ’04’, ’05’, ’06’, ’07, or ’08’).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of additionalTradeItemClassificationCodeDescription for each languageCode.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for additionalTradeItemClassificationCodeDescription for each languageCode are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of sizeDimension for each measurement unit code.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for sizeDimenision for each measurement unit code are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of materialWeight for each measurement unit code.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for materialWeight for each measurement unit code are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '246' (Finland) and (seasonalAvailabilityEndDateTime or seasonalAvailabilityStartDateTime is used), then seasonalAvailabilityEndDateTime and seasonalAvailabilityStartDateTime SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, priceComparisonMeasurement SHALL be specified with the following units of measures: kilogram, litre or piece.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '246' (Finland) and priceComparisonMeasurement is used then at least one iteration of the related priceComparisonMeasurement/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'KGM', 'LTR' or 'H87’.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, both seasonalAvailabilityEndDateTime and seasonalAvailabilityStartDateTime SHALL be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and gpcCategoryCode is in GPC Segment '50000000' (Food/Beverage) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' then priceComparisonMeasurement SHALL be used.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals '246' (Finland) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and GDSNTradeItemClassification/gpcCategoryCode is in the GPC segment 50000000 and GPC family is not 50210000, then priceComparisonMeasurement SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Price Comparison Quantity (priceComparisonMeasurement) is required for food product(s).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH', then tradeItemTradeChannelCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Trade Item Trade Channel Code (tradeItemTradeChannelCode) SHALL be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '246' (Finland) and netMassOfExplosives is used, then at least one iteration of netMassOfExplosives/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'KGM'
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Net Mass of Explosives SHALL be specified with the unit of measure of kilogram (KGM).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode and/or manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode is used then initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode and/or manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode SHALL NOT equal "NOT_STERILISED".
Rule.Message: For initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode <initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode> and/or manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode <manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode> shall not equal NOT_STERILISED and is invalidly used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of nutrientNameOnPackage for each language code.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for nutrientNameOnPackage for each language code are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If confirmationStatusCode equals 'CIC999' then additionalConfirmationStatusLongDescription SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: additionalConfirmationStatusLongDescription is missing and must be provided containing a descriptive error/warning message when confirmationStatusCode equals 'CIC999' ('Free Form Text to be populated by the Data Recipient').

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> then isTradeItemAConsumerUnit SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) must not be empty.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (endAvailabilityDateTime and ChildItem..endAvailabilityDateTime) are used, then ChildItem..endAvailabilityDateTime SHALL be equal to or after endAvailabilityDateTime.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the Contained Product <ChildItem..gtin> End Availability Date/Time (endAvailabiltyDateTime) <ChildItem..endAvailabiltyDateTime> SHALL be equal or after the GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) <gtin> End Availability Date/Time (endAvailabiltyDateTime) <endAvailabiltyDateTime>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAVariableUnit equals 'false' then additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode SHALL NOT equal 'PLU'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Variable Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) equals 'false', then Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) SHALL NOT equal 'PLU'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and TradeItem/PartyInRole/partyRoleCode equals ('PURCHASE_ORDER_RECEIVER' or 'SHIP_FROM'), then TradeItem/PartyInRole/gln and TradeItem/PartyInRole/partyName SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Party Role Code (partyInRole/partyRoleCode) equals <TradeItem/PartyInRole/partyRoleCode>, then Party In Role GLN (Global Location Number) (TradeItem/PartyInRole/gln) and Party In Role name (TradeItem/PartyInRole/partyName) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and ChildItem..isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit equals 'true', then isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the Contained Product <ChildItem..gtin> Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) equals 'true', then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) <gtin> Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) shall equal 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and dutyFeeTaxCategoryCode does not equal 'EXEMPT' and dutyFeeTaxAmount is used, then dutyFeeTaxAmount SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Tax Amount (dutyFeeTaxAmount) shall be greater than 0 (zero).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemADespatchUnit equals 'true', then packagingTypeCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Despatch Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) equals 'true', then Packaging Type Code (packagingTypeCode) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'SUBSTITUTED', then tradeItem/gtin SHALL not equal referencedTradeItem/gtin.
Rule.Message: If Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'SUBSTITUTED', then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) (tradeItem/gtin) and Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) shall be different.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit equals 'true', then promotionTypeCode and nonPromotionalTradeItem/gtin SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true' and Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) equals 'true', then Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) and Non Promotional Trade Item GTIN (nonPromotionalTradeItem/gtin) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and promotionTypeCode is used, then isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) is used, then Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) shall equal 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If species is used, then genus SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: genus is missing for this trade item. When species is used, genus must also be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationInstructions is used then preparationTypeCode SHALL be used.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationInstructions is used, then preparationTypeCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message:
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Preparation Instructions (preparationInstructions) is used, then Preparation Type Code (preparationTypeCode) must be used.
Preparation Type Code (preparationTypeCode) is missing for this trade item. For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> when Preparation Instructions (preparationInstructions) is used, Preparation Type Code (preparationTypeCode) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: (Warning) If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED', then additionalTradeItemIdentification SHALL be less than or equal to 35 characters.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, and Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) equals 'SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED', then the maximum length of Additional Product Identification (additionnalTradeItemIdentification) shall be 35 characters.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: packagingClaimTypeCode and packagingClaimElementCode should be both used if one is used.
