Rule.Message: packagingClaimTypeCode and packagingClaimElementCode, both should be used if one uses any of them.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: cannabinoidMinimumRangeValue and cannabinoidMaximumRangeValue, if one value is used the other should be used as well
Rule.Message: cannabinoidMinimumRangeValue and cannabinoidMaximumRangeValue, both should be used if one uses any of them.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: minimumTerpeneContent and maximumTerpeneContent, if one value is used the other should be used as well
Rule.Message: minimumTerpeneContent and maximumTerpeneContent, both should be used if one uses any of them.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of packagingMaterialAdhesiveAmount for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for packagingMaterialAdhesiveAmount for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of curingMethodDescription for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for curingMethodDescription for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of batteryDeviceCompatibilityStatement for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for batteryDeviceCompatibilityStatement for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> then organicTradeItemCode SHALL NOT equal '1'.
Rule.Message: Code '1' (100% Organic) is not allowed in Organic Level Code (organicTradeItemCode) for Country Of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode Code name>. Please use code '2' (Organic) instead.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK' and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true', then totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem SHALL be greater than 1.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK' and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Total Count of All Products (totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) shall be greater than 1.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equals '3001000002312', then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', and Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) equals '3001000002312' (Droits d'accises sur les alcools/alcohol tax), then Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) shall be greater than 0 (zero).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals ('DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'MIXED_MODULE') and quantityOfChildren is greater than 1, then tradeItem/gtin SHALL start with '0'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'MIXED_MODULE' and Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) is greater than 1, then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) (tradeItem/gtin) shall start with '0'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and freeQuantityOfProduct is used, then freeQuantityOfProduct/@measurementUnitCode SHALL be equal to one instance of netContent/@measurementUnitCode.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Product (freeQuantityOfQuantity) is used, then Free Quantity Of Product Unit Of Measure (freeQuantityOfProduct@measurementUnitCode) shall be equal to one instance of Net Content Unit Of Measure (netContent@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and promotionTypeCode equals 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK', then isTradeItemABaseUnit SHALL NOT equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) equals 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK', then Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) shall not equal 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and freeQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem is used, then tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode SHALL equal 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK', quantityOfChildren SHALL be greater than 1 and promotionTypeCode SHALL equal 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Next Lower Level Trade Item (freeQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) is used, then Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) shall equal 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK', Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) shall be greater than 1 and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) shall equal 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true', then at least one iteration of dutyFeeTaxTypeCode SHALL equal ('S' , '1G' , '2G' , '3G' , 'H' or 'E').
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then at least one iteration of Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) shall be one of the VAT tax codes ('S', '1G', '2G', '3G', 'H' or 'E').

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> then organicTradeItemCode SHALL NOT equal '1'.
Rule.Message: Code '1' (100% Organic) is not allowed in Organic Level Code (organicTradeItemCode) for Country Of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode Code name>. Please use code '2' (Organic) instead.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK' and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true', then totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem SHALL be greater than 1.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK' and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Total Count of All Products (totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) shall be greater than 1.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equals '3001000002312', then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', and Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) equals '3001000002312' (Droits d'accises sur les alcools/alcohol tax), then Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) shall be greater than 0 (zero).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals ('DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'MIXED_MODULE') and quantityOfChildren is greater than 1, then tradeItem/gtin SHALL start with '0'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'MIXED_MODULE' and Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) is greater than 1, then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) (tradeItem/gtin) shall start with '0'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and freeQuantityOfProduct is used, then freeQuantityOfProduct/@measurementUnitCode SHALL be equal to one instance of netContent/@measurementUnitCode.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Product (freeQuantityOfQuantity) is used, then Free Quantity Of Product Unit Of Measure (freeQuantityOfProduct@measurementUnitCode) shall be equal to one instance of Net Content Unit Of Measure (netContent@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and promotionTypeCode equals 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK', then isTradeItemABaseUnit SHALL NOT equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) equals 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK', then Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) shall not equal 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and freeQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem is used, then tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode SHALL equal 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK', quantityOfChildren SHALL be greater than 1 and promotionTypeCode SHALL equal 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Next Lower Level Trade Item (freeQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) is used, then Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) shall equal 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK', Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) shall be greater than 1 and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) shall equal 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true', then at least one iteration of dutyFeeTaxTypeCode SHALL equal ('S' , '1G' , '2G' , '3G' , 'H' or 'E').
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then at least one iteration of Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) shall be one of the VAT tax codes ('S', '1G', '2G', '3G', 'H' or 'E').

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', then quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer SHALL be greater than 0.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', then Number of Units per Layer in a GTIN (quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer) shall be greater than 0.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', then platformTermsAndConditionsCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', Pallet Disposition Code (platformTermsAndConditionsCode) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and gpcCategoryCode is in GPC Segment '50000000' and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true', then netWeight SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) is in GPC Segment '50000000' (Food/Beverage) and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', Net Weight (netWeight) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit equals 'true' and isTradeItemAVariableUnit equals 'true', then sellingUnitOfMeasure SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Invoice Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit) equals 'true' and Variable Unit indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) equals 'true', Selling Unit Of Measure (sellingUnitOfMeasure) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (startAvailabilityDateTime and ChildItem..startAvailabilityDateTime) are used, then ChildItem..startAvailabilityDateTime SHALL be before or equal to startAvailabilityDateTime.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the Start Availability Date/Time (startAvailabiltyDateTime) <ChildItem..startAvailabiltyDateTime> of the contained product <ChildItem..gtin> shall be before or equal to the Start Availability Date/Time <startAvailabiltyDateTime> of the product.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and referencedTradeItem/gtin is used, then referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique across all iterations where referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals ('DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY', 'EQUIVALENT', 'PRIMARY_ALTERNATIVE', 'REPLACED', 'REPLACED_BY', 'SUBSTITUTED' or 'SUBSTITUTED_BY').
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #n>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If referencedTradeItem/gtin is used, then referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique across all iterations where referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals ('REPLACED' or 'REPLACED_BY').
Rule.Message: Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #2>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If referencedTradeItem/gtin is used, then referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique across all iterations where referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals ('SUBSTITUTED' or 'SUBSTITUTED_BY').
Rule.Message: Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #2>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemDescription is used, then at least one iteration of tradeItemDescription/@languageCode SHALL equal to 'fi' (Finnish), 'sv' (Swedish) and 'en' (English).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Product Description (tradeItemDescription) must be in Finnish, Swedish and English.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and descriptionShort is used, then one iteration of descriptionShort/@languageCode SHALL equal to 'fi' (Finnish), 'sv' (Swedish) and 'en' (English).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Short Product Name (descriptionShort) must be in Finnish, Swedish and English.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and ingredientStatement is used, then at least one iteration of ingredientStatement/@languageCcode SHALL equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Ingredient Statement (ingredientStatement) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic>, then descriptionShort SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Short Product Name (descriptionShort) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and consumerStorageInstructions is used, then at least one iteration of consumerStorageInstructions/@languageCode SHALL equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Consumer Storage Instructions (consumerStorageInstructions) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and consumerUsageInstructions is used, then at least one iteration of consumerUsageInstructions/@languageCode SHALL be equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Consumer Usage Instructions (consumerUsageInstructions) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationInstructions is used, then one iteration of preparationInstructions/@languageCode SHALL be equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Preparation Instructions (preparationInstructions) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and servingSuggestion is used, then one iteration of servingSuggestion/@languageCode SHALL be equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Serving Suggestion (servingSuggestion) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and nonFoodIngredientStatement is used, then at least one iteration of nonFoodIngredientStatement/@languageCode SHALL be equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Non-Food Ingredient Statement (nonFoodIngredientStatement) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and shortTradeItemMarketingMessage is used, then at least one iteration of shortTradeItemMarketingMessage/@languageCode SHALL be equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Short Product Marketing Message (shortTradeItemMarketingMessage) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and compulsoryAdditiveLabelInformation is used, then one iteration of compulsoryAdditiveLabelInformation/@languageCode SHALL be equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Additional Legal Product Information (compulsoryAdditiveLabelInformation) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and functionalName is used, then one iteration of functionalName/@languageCode SHALL be equal to 'fi' (Finnish) and 'sv' (Swedish).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Product Type Description (functionalName) must be in Finnish and Swedish.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemDescription is used, then at least one iteration of tradeItemDescription/@languageCode SHALL equal to 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Product Description (tradeItemDescription) must be in Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If there is more than one iteration of dangerousHazardousLabel, then dangerousHazardousLabelSequenceNumber SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: When more than one Dangerous Hazardous Label Number (dangerousHazardousLabelNumber) is provided, Dangerous Hazardous Label Sequence Number (dangerousHazardousLabelSequenceNumber) shall be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of maximumProcessTemperatureTimeSpan for each measurement
Rule.Message: Multiple values for maximumProcessTemperatureTimeSpan for each time measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of minimumProcessTemperatureTimeSpan for each measurement
Rule.Message: Multiple values for minimumProcessTemperatureTimeSpan for each time measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and referencedTradeItem/gtin is used, then referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique across all iterations where referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals ('DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY', 'EQUIVALENT', 'PRIMARY_ALTERNATIVE', 'REPLACED', 'REPLACED_BY', 'SUBSTITUTED' or 'SUBSTITUTED_BY').
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #n>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If referencedTradeItem/gtin is used, then referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique across all iterations where referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals ('REPLACED' or 'REPLACED_BY').
Rule.Message: Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #2>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If referencedTradeItem/gtin is used, then referencedTradeItem/gtin SHALL be unique across all iterations where referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals ('SUBSTITUTED' or 'SUBSTITUTED_BY').
Rule.Message: Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #2>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode does not equal ('PALLET ' or 'MIXED_MODULE') then packagingTypeCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Packaging Type Code (packagingTypeCode) SHALL be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'false' then netContent SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Net Content (netContent) is mandatory on base units (Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) equals to 'true').

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If orderingLeadTime is used then orderingLeadTime/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'DAY'.
Rule.Message: Invalid measurement unit for Ordering Lead Time (orderingLeadTime): <orderingLeadTime/@measurementUnitCode>. Ordering Lead Time must have 'DAY' as the measurement unit.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equals ('VAT' or 'IVA') then dutyFeeTaxRate SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true' and Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) equals ('VAT' or 'IVA'), then Tax Percentage (dutyFeeTaxRate) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals 'FALSE' or is not used) and quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem is used and quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer is used then totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem SHALL equal quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem multiplied by quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Irregularly Configured Pallet Indicator (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly) equals 'FALSE' or is not used, then Total Count of All Products (totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) must be equal to Number of Layers per GTIN (quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem) multiplied by Number of Units per Layer in a GTIN (quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' then dutyFeeTaxTypeCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (isNonGTINLogisticsUnitPackedIrregularly equals 'FALSE' or is not used) and quantityOfLayersPerPallet is used then quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Number of Layers per Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfLayersPerPallet) is used, then Number of Units per Layer in a Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals 'FALSE' or is not used) then quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer SHALL be greater than 0 (zero).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' and Irregularly Configured Pallet Indicator (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly) equals 'FALSE' or is not used, then Number of Units per Layer in a GTIN (quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer) must be used and greater than 0 (zero).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/depth is used and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/width is used then nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/depth must be greater than or equal to nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/width.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Non-GTIN Logistic Unit Depth/Length (nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/depth) must be greater than or equal to Non-GTIN Logistic Unit Width (nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/width).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (isNonGTINLogisticsUnitPackedIrregularly equals 'FALSE' or is not used) and quantityOfLayersPerPallet is used and quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used then quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet SHALL equal quantityOfLayersPerPallet multiplied by quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Irregularly Configured Non-GTIN Pallet Indicator (isNonGTINLogisticsUnitPackedIrregularly) equals 'FALSE' or is not used, then Count of This Specific Item in a Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet) must equal Number of Layers per Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfLayersPerPallet) multiplied by Number of Units per Layer in a Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' then one iteration of descriptionShort/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) equals 'true', then at least one iteration of Short Product Name (descriptionShort) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' or isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true') then one iteration of tradeItemDescription/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) equals 'true' or Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then at least one iteration of Product Description (tradeItemDescription) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and functionalName is used then one iteration of functionalName/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Product Type Description (functionalName) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and hazardStatementsDescription is used then one iteration of hazardStatementsDescription/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Hazardous Statements Description (hazardStatementsDescription) must be provided in German, French or Italian.
