Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and precautionaryStatementsDescription is used then one iteration of precautionaryStatementsDescription/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Precautionary Statement Description (precautionaryStatementsDescription) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationInstructions is used then one iteration of preparationInstructions/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Preparation Instructions (preparationInstructions) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and hazardousMaterialAdditionalInformation is used then one iteration of hazardousMaterialAdditionalInformation/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Hazardous Material Additional Information (hazardousMaterialAdditionalInformation) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dangerousGoodsTechnicalName is used then one iteration of dangerousGoodsTechnicalName/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Dangerous Goods Technical Name (dangerousGoodsTechnicalName) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and productCharacteristicValueDescription is used then one iteration of productCharacteristicValueDescription/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Product Characteristic Value as a Description (productCharacteristicValueDescription) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and servingSuggestion is used then one iteration of servingSuggestion/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Serving Suggestion (servingSuggestion) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and fatPercentageInDryMatter is used then fatInMilkContent SHALL NOT be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Percent of Fat in Cheese (fatPercentageInDryMatter) and Percent of Milk Fat in Dairy (fatInMilkContent) must not be used at the same time.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and multiple iterations of nutritionalProgramCode equal '8' then nutritionalProgramDetail SHALL be used in each corresponding iteration.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if multiple iterations of Nutritional Program Code (nutritionalProgramCode) equal '8' (Nutri-Score), then Nutritional Program Detail (nutritionalProgramDetail) must be used in each corresponding iteration.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and nutritionalProgramCode equals '8' and nutritionalProgramDetail is used then one iteration of nutritionalProgramDetail/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Nutritional Program Code (nutritionalProgramCode) equals '8' (Nutri-Score) and Nutritional Program Detail (nutritionalProgramDetail) is used, then at least one iteration of Nutritional Program Detail must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and regulationTypeCode equals 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION' and isTradeItemRegulationCompliant equals 'TRUE' then regulationLevelCodeReference and regulatoryActComplianceLevelCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Regulation Type Code (regulationTypeCode) equals 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator (isTradeItemRegulationCompliant) equals 'TRUE', then Regulation Level Code Reference (regulationLevelCodeReference) and Regulatory Act Compliance Level Code (regulatoryActComplianceLevelCode) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and priceBasisQuantity is used then priceBasisQuantity/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal ('H87', 'KGM', 'LTR' or 'MTR').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'H87', 'KGM', 'LTR' or 'MTR' are allowed for Price Basis Quantity UoM (priceBasisQuantity/@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and priceBasisQuantity is used then priceBasisQuantity SHALL equal 1, 10, 100 or 1000.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the values 1, 10, 100 or 1000 are allowed for Price Basis Quantity (priceBasisQuantity).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dietTypeSubcode equals ('LACTO', 'LACTO_OVO' or 'OVO') then dietTypeCode SHALL equal 'VEGETARIAN'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Diet Type Subcode (dietTypeSubcode) <dietTypeSubcode value> is only allowed if Dietary Regime Code (dietTypeCode) is 'VEGETARIAN'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and claimMarkedOnPackage is used then claimTypeCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Claim Marked on Package (claimMarkedOnPackage) is only allowed if Claim Type Code (claimTypeCode) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and fatPercentageInDryMatterMeasurementPrecisionCode is used then fatPercentageInDryMatter SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Fat Percentage in Dry Matter Measurement Precision Code (fatPercentageInDryMatterMeasurementPrecisionCode) is only allowed if Percent of Fat in Cheese (fatPercentageInDryMatter) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and nestingIncrement is used then at least one of nestingTypeCode or nestingDirectionCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Nesting Increment (nestingIncrement) is used, then at least one of the two attributes Nesting Type Code (nestingTypeCode) or Nesting Direction Code (nestingDirectionCode) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (nestingTypeCode or nestingDirectionCode is used) then nestingIncrement SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Nesting Type Code (nestingTypeCode) and Nesting Direction Code (nestingDirectionCode) are only allowed if Nesting Increment (nestingIncrement) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and percentageOfAlcoholByVolumeMeasurementPrecisionCode is used then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Percentage Of Alcohol By Volume Measurement Precision Code (percentageOfAlcoholByVolumeMeasurementPrecisionCode) is only allowed if Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and itemPeriodSafeToUseAfterOpening is used then itemPeriodSafeToUseAfterOpening/@timeMeasurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'ANN' or 'MON'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'ANN' (Year) or 'MON' (Month) are allowed for Usage Period After Opening UoM (itemPeriodSafeToUseAfterOpening/@timeMeasurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and brandDistributionTradeItemTypeCode equals 'CUSTOM_LABEL' then brandDistributionTradeItemTypeCode SHALL equal 'CUSTOM_LABEL' on all levels of the trade item hierarchy.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) equals 'true' and Brand Distribution Trade Item Type Code (brandDistributionTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'CUSTOM_LABEL', then Brand Distribution Trade Item Type Code must equal 'CUSTOM_LABEL' on all levels of the trade item hierarchy.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurementPrecisionCode is used then numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurementPrecisionCode SHALL equal 'APPROXIMATELY'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Servings Per Product Precision Code (numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurementPrecisionCode) is used, then 'APPROXIMATELY' is the only allowed code.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and geneticallyModifiedDeclarationCode is used then it SHALL equal ('CONTAINS', 'FREE_FROM' or 'MAY_CONTAIN').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Genetically Modified Declaration Code (geneticallyModifiedDeclarationCode) is used, then 'CONTAINS', 'FREE_FROM' or 'MAY_CONTAIN' are the only allowed codes.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and brandDistributionTradeItemTypeCode equals 'PRIVATE_LABEL' then brandDistributionTradeItemTypeCode SHALL equal 'PRIVATE_LABEL' on all levels of the trade item hierarchy.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) equals 'true' and Brand Distribution Trade Item Type Code (brandDistributionTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'PRIVATE_LABEL', then Brand Distribution Trade Item Type Code must equal 'PRIVATE_LABEL' on all levels of the trade item hierarchy.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and quantityOfChildren is greater than 1 and netContent is used then netContent/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'H87' (Piece).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if the trade item is a complex trade item, i.e., Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) is greater than 1, then the complex trade item's Net Content UOM (netContent/@measurementUnitCode) must equal 'H87' (Piece).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and quantityOfChildren is greater than 1 and netContent is used then netContent SHALL equal totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if the trade item is a complex trade item, i.e., Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) is greater than 1, then the Net Content (netContent) must equal the Total Count of All Products (totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and hazardStatementsCode equals 'EUH208' then hazardStatementsDescription SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Hazardous Statements Code (hazardStatementsCode) equals 'EUH208', then Hazardous Statements Description (hazardStatementsDescription) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Precautionary Statements Code (precautionaryStatementsCode) equals <precautionaryStatementsCode Code>, then Precautionary Statement Description (precautionaryStatementsDescription) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and gpcCategoryCode equals '10000159' (Beer) and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' then degreeOfOriginalWort SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) equals '10000159' (Beer) and Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) equals 'true', then Degree Of Original Wort (degreeOfOriginalWort) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (brandOwner/gln is used or brandOwner/partyName is used) then brandOwner/gln SHALL be used and brandOwner/partyName SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, both Brand Owner GLN (brandOwner/gln) and Brand Owner Name (brandOwner/partyName) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and cataloguePrice/tradeItemPrice is used then cataloguePrice/priceBasisQuantity SHALL be used and cataloguePrice/priceEffectiveStartDate SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Catalogue Price (cataloguePrice/tradeItemPrice) is used, then Catalogue Price Basis Quantity (cataloguePrice/priceBasisQuantity) and Catalogue Price Effective Start Date (cataloguePrice/priceEffectiveStartDate) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and orderQuantityMinimum is used then isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Minimum Orderable Quantity (orderQuantityMinimum) is only allowed if Orderable Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit) equals 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and pegHoleNumber is used then pegHoleTypeCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Peg Hole Number (pegHoleNumber) is used, then Peg Hole Type Code (pegHoleTypeCode) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer is used then tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode SHALL equal ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Number of Units per Layer in a GTIN (quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer) is only allowed if Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used then tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode SHALL NOT equal ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') and isTradeItemADespatchUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Number of Units per Layer in a non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer) is only allowed if Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) is NOT equal to 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', and Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) equals 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') then isTradeItemADespatchUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', then Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) must equal 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (variableWeightRangeMinimum is used or variableWeightRangeMaximum is used) then variableWeightRangeMinimum SHALL be used and variableWeightRangeMaximum SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, both Variable Weight Range Minimum (variableWeightRangeMinimum) and Variable Weight Range Maximum (variableWeightRangeMaximum) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (variableWeightAllowableDeviationPercentage is used or variableWeightRangeMinimum is used or variableWeightRangeMaximum is used) then isTradeItemAVariableUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Variable Weight Allowable Deviation Percentage (variableWeightAllowableDeviationPercentage), Variable Weight Range Minimum (variableWeightRangeMinimum) and Variable Weight Range Maximum (variableWeightRangeMaximum) are only allowed if Variable Measure Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) equals 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and isPriceOnPack equals 'true' then suggestedRetailPrice/tradeItemPrice SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Retail Price is Marked on the Product Indicator (isPriceOnPack) equals 'true' for a base unit, then Suggested Retail Price (suggestedRetailPrice/tradeItemPrice) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and suggestedRetailPrice/tradeItemPrice is used then suggestedRetailPrice/priceEffectiveStartDate SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Suggested Retail Price (suggestedRetailPrice/tradeItemPrice) is used, then Suggested Retail Price Effective Start Date (suggestedRetailPrice/priceEffectiveStartDate) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and statisticalReportingMeasurement is used then importClassificationValue SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Statistical Reporting Measurement (statisticalReportingMeasurement) is only allowed if Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurementPrecisionCode is used then numberOfServingsPerPackage SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Servings Per Product Precision Code (numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurementPrecisionCode) is only allowed if Servings Per Product (numberOfServingsPerPackage) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and numberOfServingsPerPackage is used then numberOfServingsRangeDescription SHALL NOT be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Servings Per Product (numberOfServingsPerPackage) and Range of the Number of Servings (numberOfServingsRangeDescription) must not be used together.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and microbiologicalOrganismCode is used then microbiologicalOrganismMaximumValue SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Microbiological Organism Code (microbiologicalOrganismCode) is used, then Microbiological Organism Maximum Value (microbiologicalOrganismMaximumValue) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') then one iteration of TradeItemStacking class SHALL have stackingFactorTypeCode equal to 'STORAGE_UNSPECIFIED'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if the Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE'), then Storage Stacking Factor (stackingFactorTypeCode equal to 'STORAGE_UNSPECIFIED') must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') then quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if the Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE'), then Number of Layers per GTIN (quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode does not equal ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') and isTradeItemADespatchUnit equals 'true' and (platformTypeCode is used and does not equal '98') then platformTermsAndConditionsCode SHALL be used in every iteration where platformTypeCode is used and quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet SHALL be used and quantityOfLayersPerPallet SHALL be used and logisticsUnitStackingFactor SHALL be used and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight SHALL be used and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/height SHALL be used and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/depth SHALL be used and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/width SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if the trade item is not a pallet or mixed module, but it is a Despatch Unit and a Pallet Type Code (platformTypeCode) is specified, then the corresponding Pallet Disposition Code (platformTermsAndConditionsCode) and non-GTIN pallet information must be provided. Some non-GTIN pallet information is missing: <Attribute name(s)>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and platformTypeCode is used then isTradeItemADespatchUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Pallet Type Code (platformTypeCode) is only allowed if Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) equals 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemGroupIdentificationCodeReference is used then tradeItemGroupIdentificationCodeReference/@codeDescription SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Group Identification Code (tradeItemGroupIdentificationCodeReference) is used, then the corresponding code description (tradeItemGroupIdentificationCodeReference/@codeDescription) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and physicalResourceTypeCode equals 'ELECTRICITY' and physicalResourceUsageRatingScaleCodeReference is used and physicalResourceUsageRatingScaleCodeReference/@codeListName equals 'EU_EnergyEfficiencyScale' then physicalResourceUsageClassificationCodeReference SHALL be used in the same iteration.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Physical Resource Type Code (physicalResourceTypeCode) equals 'ELECTRICITY', then Physical Resource Usage Rating Scale Code (physicalResourceUsageRatingScaleCodeReference) with physicalResourceUsageRatingScaleCodeReference/@codeListName equal 'EU_EnergyEfficiencyScale' is only allowed if the corresponding Physical Resource Usage Rating Classification Code (physicalResourceUsageClassificationCodeReference) [= Efficiency class] is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and referencedFileTypeCode is used then uniformResourceIdentifier SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Digital Asset Type Code (referencedFileTypeCode) is used, then Digital Asset Link (uniformResourceIdentifier) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> then handlingInstructionsCodeReference codes '11' and '12' SHALL NOT be used for the same trade item.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Product Handling Code (handlingInstructionsCodeReference) codes '11' (Refrigeration required) and '12' (Refrigeration not required) must not be used for the same trade item.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (sizeCode is used or sizeSystemCode is used) then sizeCode SHALL be used and sizeSystemCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Size Code (sizeCode) and Size System Code (sizeSystemCode) must be used together.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and certificationStandard is used and certificationAgency equals 'Additional_Label_Information' then certificationValue SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Certification Standard (certificationStandard) is used and Certification Agency (certificationAgency) equals 'Additional_Label_Information', then Certification Value (certificationValue) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and (dangerousGoodsRegulationAgency is used or dangerousGoodsRegulationCode is used) then dangerousGoodsRegulationCode SHALL be used and dangerousGoodsRegulationAgency SHALL equal 'ADR'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Dangerous Goods Regulation Agency (dangerousGoodsRegulationAgency) and Dangerous Goods Regulation Code (dangerousGoodsRegulationCode) can only be used together and Dangerous Goods Regulation Agency (dangerousGoodsRegulationAgency) must equal 'ADR'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dangerousGoodsRegulationCode is used then dangerousGoodsRegulationCode SHALL equal ('ZCG' or 'ZNA').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Dangerous Goods Regulation Code (dangerousGoodsRegulationCode) is used, only the codes 'ZCG' (Contains Dangerous Goods) or 'ZNA' (Item is not a dangerous good nor contains dangerous good(s)) are allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ZCG' then classOfDangerousGoods SHALL be used and dangerousGoodsClassificationCode SHALL be used and unitedNationsDangerousGoodsNumber SHALL be used and dangerousGoodsHazardousCode SHALL be used and dangerousGoodsPackingGroup SHALL be used and dangerousGoodsTechnicalName SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if trade item contains dangerous goods (dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ZCG'), other dangerous goods information must be used for base unit: <Attribute name>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (classOfDangerousGoods is used or dangerousGoodsClassificationCode is used or unitedNationsDangerousGoodsNumber is used or dangerousGoodsHazardousCode is used or dangerousGoodsPackingGroup is used or dangerousGoodsTechnicalName is used or netMassOfExplosives is used or dangerousGoodsSpecialProvisions is used or aDRTunnelRestrictionCode is used or hazardousMaterialAdditionalInformation is used) then isTradeItemABaseUnit SHALL equal 'true' and dangerousGoodsRegulationCode SHALL equal 'ZCG'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, this/these attribute/s <Attribute name> belong/s to the dangerous goods information and is/are only allowed for the base unit (isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true') and if Dangerous Goods Regulation Code (dangerousGoodsRegulationCode) equals 'ZCG' (Contains Dangerous Goods).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and classOfDangerousGoods equals '1' then netMassOfExplosives SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Dangerous Goods Classification (classOfDangerousGoods) equals '1' (Explosive substances and articles), then Net Explosive Mass (netMassOfExplosives) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and netMassOfExplosives is used then classOfDangerousGoods SHALL equal '1'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Net Explosive Mass (netMassOfExplosives) is only allowed if Dangerous Goods Classification (classOfDangerousGoods) equals '1' (Explosive substances and articles).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode is used then dangerousGoodsRegulationCode SHALL equal 'ZCG' on at least one trade item in the hierarchy where isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Dangerous Goods Limited Quantities Code (dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode) is only allowed if at least one of the contained base items contains dangerous goods (dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ZCG').

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ZCG' then dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode SHALL be used and dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode SHALL be used on all its parent levels of the trade item hierarchy.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if the base unit trade item contains dangerous goods (dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ZCG'), then Dangerous Goods Limited Quantities Code (dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode) must be used on the base unit trade item and on all its parent levels of the trade item hierarchy.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemDateOnPackagingTypeCode is used and tradeItemDateOnPackagingTypeCode is not in ('NO_DATE_MARKED', 'DISPLAY_UNTIL_DATE', 'FREEZING_DATE', 'PACKAGING_DATE', 'PRODUCTION_DATE') then minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival SHALL be used or minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Packaging Date Type Code (tradeItemDateOnPackagingTypeCode) is used and not equal to ('NO_DATE_MARKED', 'DISPLAY_UNTIL_DATE', 'FREEZING_DATE', 'PACKAGING_DATE' or 'PRODUCTION_DATE'), then Minimum Days of Shelf Life at Arrival (minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival) and/or Minimum Days of Shelf Life from Production (minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and regulatoryAct equals 'GHS' and corresponding regulatoryPermitIdentification equals 'TRUE' then gHSSymbolDescriptionCode SHALL be used and hazardStatementsCode SHALL be used and precautionaryStatementsCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Regulatory Act (regulatoryAct) equals 'GHS' and Regulatory Permit Identification (regulatoryPermitIdentification) equals 'TRUE', then other GHS information must be used for the base unit: <Attribute name>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (gHSSymbolDescriptionCode is used or gHSSignalWordsCode is used or dangerousSubstanceWasteCode/enumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue is used or dangerousSubstancePhaseOfMatterCode is used or dangerousSubstanceGasDensity is used or dangerousSubstancesWaterSolubilityCode is used or chemicalIngredientIdentification is used) then one iteration of regulatoryAct SHALL equal 'GHS' and corresponding regulatoryPermitIdentification SHALL equal 'TRUE'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, attribute/s <Attribute name> belong/s to the GHS information and is/are only allowed if Regulatory Act (regulatoryAct) equals 'GHS' and Regulatory Permit Identification (regulatoryPermitIdentification) equals 'TRUE'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dangerousSubstanceWasteCode/enumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue is used then corresponding dangerousSubstanceWasteCode/externalAgencyName SHALL equal 'EU'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Dangerous Substance Waste Code (dangerousSubstanceWasteCode/enumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue) is only allowed if the corresponding agency (dangerousSubstanceWasteCode/externalAgencyName) equals 'EU'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (chemicalIngredientIdentification is used or chemicalIngredientScheme is used) then chemicalIngredientIdentification SHALL be used and chemicalIngredientScheme SHALL equal 'UFI'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Chemical Ingredient Identification [Unique Formula Identifier (UFI)] (chemicalIngredientIdentification) must be used together and Chemical Ingredient Scheme (chemicalIngredientScheme) must equal 'UFI'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and hazardStatementsDescription is used then hazardStatementsCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Hazardous Statements Description (hazardStatementsDescription) is only allowed if Hazardous Statements Code (hazardStatementsCode) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and precautionaryStatementsDescription is used then precautionaryStatementsCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Precautionary Statement Description (precautionaryStatementsDescription) is only allowed if Precautionary Statements Code (precautionaryStatementsCode) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (dangerousSubstanceName is used or flammableSubstanceMinimumPercent is used or flammableSubstanceMaximumPercent is used) then dangerousSubstanceName SHALL be used and flammableSubstanceMinimumPercent SHALL be used and flammableSubstanceMaximumPercent SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Dangerous Substance Name (dangerousSubstanceName), Flammable Substance Minimum Percent (flammableSubstanceMinimumPercent) and Flammable Substance Maximum Percent (flammableSubstanceMaximumPercent) can only be used together.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (regulationLevelCodeReference is used or regulatoryActComplianceLevelCode is used) then regulationTypeCode SHALL equal 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION' and isTradeItemRegulationCompliant SHALL equal 'TRUE'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Regulation Level Code Reference (regulationLevelCodeReference) and Regulatory Act Compliance Level Code (regulatoryActComplianceLevelCode) are only allowed if Regulation Type Code (regulationTypeCode) equals 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator (isTradeItemRegulationCompliant) equals 'TRUE'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and additiveInformation/levelOfContainmentCode is used then additiveInformation/levelOfContainmentCode SHALL equal 'CONTAINS'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the code 'CONTAINS' is allowed for Additive Containment Code (additiveInformation/levelOfContainmentCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and fatPercentageInDryMatterMeasurementPrecisionCode is used then fatPercentageInDryMatterMeasurementPrecisionCode SHALL equal 'GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the code 'GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL' is allowed for Fat Percentage in Dry Matter Measurement Precision Code (fatPercentageInDryMatterMeasurementPrecisionCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and fileSize is used then fileSize/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal ('2P', '4L', 'AD', 'E34' or 'E35').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes '2P' (Kilobyte), '4L' (Megabyte), 'AD' (Byte), 'E34' (Gigabyte) or 'E35' (Terabyte) are allowed for File Size UoM (fileSize/@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity is used then packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal ('CMK', 'DMK', 'GRM', 'KGM', 'MGM', 'MMK', 'MTK' or 'TNE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'CMK' (Square centimetre), 'DMK' (Square decimetre), 'GRM' (Gram), 'KGM' (Kilogram), 'MGM' (Milligram), 'MMK' (Square millimetre), 'MTK' (Square metre) or 'TNE' (Tonne) are allowed for Packaging Material Quantity UoM (packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity/@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dangerousSubstanceGasDensity is used then dangerousSubstanceGasDensity/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal ('23' or 'GL').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes '23' (Grams Per Cubic Centimetre) or 'GL' (Gram Per Litre) are allowed for Dangerous Substance Gas Density UoM (dangerousSubstanceGasDensity/@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and allergen/levelOfContainmentCode is used then allergen/levelOfContainmentCode SHALL equal ('CONTAINS' or 'MAY_CONTAIN').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'CONTAINS' or 'MAY_CONTAIN' are allowed for Allergen Containment Code (allergen/levelOfContainmentCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and countryOfActivity/countryCode is used and corresponding productActivityTypeCode equals 'LAST_PROCESSING' then countryOfActivity/countryCode SHALL NOT equal ('097' or 'NON_EU').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Product Activity Type Code (productActivityTypeCode) equals 'LAST_PROCESSING', then codes '097' (EUROPEAN UNION) and 'NON_EU' are not allowed for the corresponding Country Code (countryOfActivity/countryCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isBasePriceDeclarationRelevant is used then isBasePriceDeclarationRelevant SHALL equal ('TRUE' or 'FALSE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' are allowed for Is Base Price Declaration Relevant (isBasePriceDeclarationRelevant).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and regulatoryAgency equals 'UN' and regulatoryAct equals 'GHS' then the corresponding regulatoryPermitIdentification SHALL equal ('TRUE' or 'FALSE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Regulatory Agency (regulatoryAgency) equals 'UN' and Regulatory Act (regulatoryAct) equals 'GHS' only the codes 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' are allowed for Regulatory Permit Identification (regulatoryPermitIdentification).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isDietTypeMarkedOnPackage is used then isDietTypeMarkedOnPackage SHALL equal ('TRUE' or 'FALSE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' are allowed for Is Diet Type Marked on Package (isDietTypeMarkedOnPackage).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and claimMarkedOnPackage is used then claimMarkedOnPackage SHALL equal ('TRUE' or 'FALSE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' are allowed for Claim Marked on Package (claimMarkedOnPackage).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and areBatteriesBuiltIn is used then areBatteriesBuiltIn SHALL equal ('TRUE' or 'FALSE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' are allowed for Batteries Built In Indicator (areBatteriesBuiltIn).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and percentageOfAlcoholByVolumeMeasurementPrecisionCode is used then percentageOfAlcoholByVolumeMeasurementPrecisionCode SHALL equal 'LESS_THAN'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the code 'LESS_THAN' is allowed for Percentage of Alcohol by Volume Measurement Precision Code (percentageOfAlcoholByVolumeMeasurementPrecisionCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and importClassificationTypeCode equals 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER' then importClassificationValue SHALL have exactly 11 digits.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Customs Classification Type Code (importClassificationTypeCode) equals 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER', then Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) must have exactly 11 digits.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and nutrientTypeCode is used then nutrientBasisQuantity SHALL be used in the parent NutrientHeader class.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Nutrient Code (nutrientTypeCode) is used, then Nutrient Basis (nutrientBasisQuantity) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and importClassificationTypeCode equals 'TARIF_INTEGRE_DE_LA_COMMUNAUTE' then corresponding importClassificationValue SHALL have exactly 10 digits.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Customs Classification Type Code (importClassificationTypeCode) equals 'TARIF_INTEGRE_DE_LA_COMMUNAUTE', then Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) must have exactly 10 digits.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and statisticalReportingMeasurement is used then statisticalReportingMeasurement/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'H87'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the code 'H87' (Piece) is allowed for Statistical Reporting Measurement UoM (statisticalReportingMeasurement/@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and ripeningTimePeriod is used then ripeningTimePeriod/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal ('ANN', 'DAY', 'HUR', 'MIN', 'MON', 'SEC' or 'WEE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'ANN' (Year), 'DAY' (Days), 'HUR' (Hour), 'MIN' (Minute), 'MON' (Month), 'SEC' (Second) or 'WEE' (Week) are allowed for Ripening Time Period UoM (ripeningTimePeriod/@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dailyValueIntakeReference is used then one iteration of dailyValueIntakeReference/@languageCode SHALL equal 'de' (German), 'fr' (French) or 'it' (Italian).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Daily Intake Reference (dailyValueIntakeReference) must be provided in German, French or Italian.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and nutrientBasisQuantity is used then (nutrientBasisQuantity and nutrientBasisQuantity/@measurementUnitCode) SHALL equal (100 'GRM', 100 'MLT', 1 'LTR' or 1 'PTN').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only '100 Gram', '100 Millilitre', '1 Litre' or '1 Portion' are allowed for Nutrient Basis (nutrientBasisQuantity) and Nutrient Basis UoM (nutrientBasisQuantity/@measurementUnitCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationTypeCode is used and preparationTypeCode is not equal to ('READY_TO_DRINK' or 'READY_TO_EAT') then preparationInstructions SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Preparation Type Code (preparationTypeCode) is not equal to 'READY_TO_DRINK' or 'READY_TO_EAT', then Preparation Instructions (preparationInstructions) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationTypeCode is used then preparationTypeCode SHALL NOT equal ('PREPARED' or 'UNPREPARED').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Preparation Type Code (preparationTypeCode) must not equal 'PREPARED' or 'UNPREPARED'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and productYieldVariationPercentage is used then productYield SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Product Yield Variation Percentage (productYieldVariationPercentage) is only allowed if Product Yield (productYield) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and preparationStateCode is used then preparationStateCode SHALL equal ('PREPARED' or 'UNPREPARED').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, only the codes 'PREPARED' or 'UNPREPARED' are allowed for Nutritional Preparation Code (preparationStateCode).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and organicTradeItemCode is used and organicTradeItemCode is equal to ('2' or '6') then organicCertificationIdentification SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Organic Level Code (organicTradeItemCode) is equal to '2' (Organic) or '6' (In conversion from non-organic to organic), then Organic Certification Identification (organicCertificationIdentification) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and organicCertificationIdentification is used then organicTradeItemCode SHALL equal ('2' or '6').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Organic Certification Identification (organicCertificationIdentification) is only allowed if Organic Level Code (organicTradeItemCode) is equal to '2' (Organic) or '6' (In conversion from non-organic to organic).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and packagingMaterial/packagingRawMaterialInformation/packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage is used and packagingMaterial/packagingRawMaterialInformation/packagingRawMaterialCode equals 'RECYCLED' then packagingMaterial/packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if packagingRawMaterialCode equals 'RECYCLED' then Packaging Raw Material Content Percentage (packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage) is only allowed if Packaging Material Composition Quantity (packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity) is used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of materialDensity for each measurement unit code (UOM).
Rule.Message: Multiple values for materialDensity for each measurement unit code (UOM) are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of packagingMaterialDensity for each measurement unit code (UOM).
Rule.Message: Multiple values for packagingMaterialDensity for each measurement unit code (UOM) are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of foodMaterialDescription for each attribute.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for foodMaterialDescription for each attribute are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of foodValueBasis for each attribute.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for foodValueBasis for each attribute are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of foodValuePerTradeItem for each attribute.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for foodValuePerTradeItem for each attribute are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of inventoryDrawdownPerTradeItem for each attribute.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for inventoryDrawdownPerTradeItem for each attribute are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of averageLife for each measurement.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for averageLife for each measurement are not allowed.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and partyReceivingPrivateData/gln SHALL be in GDS Party Registry.
Rule.Message: partyReceivingPrivateData GLN does not exist in GDS Party Registry.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and priceSynchronisationDocument/partyReceivingPrivateData is used and priceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationship/partyReceivingPrivateData/gln is used then priceSynchronisationDocument/partyReceivingPrivateData SHALL equal priceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationship/partyReceivingPrivateData/gln.
Rule.Message: Having two different values for partyReceivingPrivateData is not allowed.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and itemDepictionQualifier/itemPriceType/parentCatalogueItem/dataSource is used then itemDepictionQualifier/itemPriceType/parentCatalogueItem/dataSource SHALL equal priceSynchronisationDocument/informationProvider.
Rule.Message: dataSource and informationProvider must be the same.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and priceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationship/informationProvider is used then priceSynchronisationDocument/informationProvider SHALL be used and priceSynchronisationDocument/informationProvider SHALL equal priceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationship/informationProvider.
Rule.Message: Having two different values for informationProvider is not allowed.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and priceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationship/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/entityIdentification is used then priceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationship/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/entityIdentification SHALL equal priceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/entityIdentification.
Rule.Message: Having two different values for priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification is not allowed.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> only numeric values ('001' or a numeric code from ISO 3166-1 list) SHALL be used for attributes priceSynchronisationRelationship/incotermInformation/incotermCountryCode and priceSynchronisationRelationship/targetMarketCountryCode.
Rule.Message: The Country Code must be a numeric code defined in ISO 3166-1 code list or '001' Global.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and priceActionCode equals 'ADD' then itemPriceTypeSegmentation/entityIdentification SHALL NOT be reused with the same itemPriceTypeSegmentation/contentOwner/gln.
Rule apply to the current XML message and also between the current message and the previous version of the document.
Rule.Message: The same itemPriceTypeSegmentation already exists.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and conditionActionCode equals 'ADD' then priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification SHALL NOT be reused with the same priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification/contentOwner/gln.
Rule apply to the current XML message and also between the current message and the previous version of the document.
Rule.Message: The same priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification already exists.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and relationshipActionCode equals 'ADD' then priceSynchronisationRelationship/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification SHALL NOT be reused with the same priceSynchronisationRelationship/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/contentOwner/gln.
Rule apply to the current XML message and also between the current message and the previous version of the document.
Rule.Message: The same priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification already exists.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and relationshipActionCode equals 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then a Confirmation (PSC) message SHALL exist where PSC/../priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/entityIdentification equals PSD/../priceSynchronisationRelationship/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/entityIdentification and PSC/../priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/contentOwner/gln equals PSD/../priceSynchronisationRelationship/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification/contentOwner/gln and priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus equals ('RECEIVED', 'REVIEW' or 'SYNCHRONISED').
Rule.Message: This priceSynchronisationRelationship cannot be modified.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and priceActionCode equals 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then a Confirmation (PSC) message SHALL exist where PSC/../itemPriceTypeSegmentIdentification/entityIdentification equals PSD/../itemPriceTypeSegmentation/entityIdentification and PSC/../itemPriceTypeSegmentIdentification/contentOwner/gln equals PSD/../itemPriceTypeSegmentation/contentOwner/gln and priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus equals ('RECEIVED', 'REVIEW' or 'SYNCHRONISED').
Rule.Message: This itemPriceTypeSegmentation cannot be modified.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and conditionActionCode equals 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then a Confirmation (PSC) message SHALL exist where PSC/../priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification/entityIdentification equals PSD/../priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification/entityIdentification and PSC/../priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification/contentOwner/gln equals PSD/../priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification/contentOwner/gln and priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus equals ('RECEIVED', 'REVIEW' or 'SYNCHRONISED').
Rule.Message: This priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification cannot be modified.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and relationshipActionCode equals 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' and relationshipEffectiveEndDateTime is used then relationshipEffectiveEndDateTime SHALL be greater than or equal to the current date.
Rule.Message: This priceSynchronisationRelationship cannot be closed.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and relationshipActionCode equals 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' and relationshipEffectiveStartDateTime is updated then the previous value of relationshipEffectiveStartDateTime SHALL be greater than or equal to the current date.
Rule.Message: The relationship start date is reached, so it cannot be updated.

Rule.Name: PriceSynchronisationDocument
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> only numeric values ('001', '097' or a numeric code from ISO 3166-1 list) or 'D_A' SHALL be used for attributes itemDepictionQualifier/catalogueItemReference/targetMarketCountryCode and itemDepictionQualifier/itemPriceType/parentCatalogueItem/targetMarketcountryCode and priceSynchronisationCondition/conditionTargetEntity/catalogueItemReference/targetMarketCountryCode.
Rule.Message: The Target Market Country Code must be a numeric code defined in ISO 3166-1 code list or '001' Global or '097' European Union or 'D_A'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'PLU' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value SHALL start with one of the following prefixes ('02' , '22' , '24' , '26' , '28' , '21' , '23' , '25' , '27 or '29').
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) equals 'PLU', then associated Additional Product Identification (additionalTradeItemIdentification) value SHALL begin with ('02' , '22' , '24' , '26' , '28' , '21' , '23' , '25' , '27 or '29').

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'PLU' then isTradeItemAVariableUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) equals 'PLU', then Variable Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) SHALL equal 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAVariableUnit equals 'true' then at least one iteration of additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode SHALL equal 'PLU'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Variable Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) equals 'true', then one Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) SHALL equal 'PLU'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'PLU' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have exactly 7 digits.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) equals 'PLU', then associated Additional Product Identification (additionalTradeItemIdentification) value SHALL have exactly 7 digits.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and .../@currencycode is used then at least one iteration of .../@currencycode SHALL equal 'EUR'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Currency Code (.../@currencycode) is used, then at least one iteration of .../@currencycode SHALL equal 'EUR'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and hasDisplayReadyPackaging equals 'TRUE' then isTradeItemAConsumerUnit SHALL equal 'false'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Display Ready Packaging (hasDisplayReadyPackaging) equals 'TRUE', then Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) SHALL equal 'false'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and <attribute> is used then at least one iteration of its associated /@languageCode SHALL equal 'fr' (French).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, a value of <attribute name(s)> must be provided in French.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (gpcCategoryCode is in GPC Class '50202200' and gpcCategoryCode does not equal ('10000142', '10000143', '10008042') and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) is not used. For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, This attribute is required for all items on the lowest level of the hierarchy for Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) <gpcCategoryCode gpcCategoryName>.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemADespatchUnit equals 'true' and tradeItem/gtin begins with '9' then isTradeItemAVariableUnit SHALL equals 'true' on the lowest level of the hierarchy (isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) equals 'true' and GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) (tradeItem/gtin) begins with '9', then Variable Measure Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) must equal 'true' on the lowest level of the hierarchy where Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) equals 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of ingredientGroupName for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for ingredientGroupName for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of activeIngredientStatement for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for activeIngredientStatement for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If initialManufacturerSterilisationCode and/or manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode is used then initialManufacturerSterilisationCode and/or manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode SHALL NOT equal 'NO_STERILISATION_REQUIRED'.
Rule.Message: Initial Manufacturer Sterilisation Code (initialManufacturerSterilisationCode) and/or Manufacturer Specified Acceptable Resterilisation Code (manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode) must not equal 'NO_STERILISATION_REQUIRED' and is invalidly used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: There shall be at most one value of fieldOfApplication for each language.
Rule.Message: Multiple values for fieldOfApplication for each language are not allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equals ('VAT' or 'IVA') and dutyFeeTaxRate equals 0 (zero) then dutyFeeTaxCategoryCode SHALL equal 'ZERO' or 'EXEMPT'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) equals ('VAT' or 'IVA') and Tax Percentage (dutyFeeTaxRate) equals 0 (zero), then Tax Category Code (dutyFeeTaxCategoryCode) must be 'ZERO' or 'EXEMPT'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (isNonGTINLogisticsUnitPackedIrregularly equals 'FALSE' or is not used) and (nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/depth is used or nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/width is used or nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/height is used or nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight is used or quantityOfLayersPerPallet is used or quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used or quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet is used) then nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/depth and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/width and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/height and nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight and quantityOfLayersPerPallet and quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer and quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: You are providing information on Non-GTIN Pallet. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if any of the following attributes is provided, then all must be provided: Non-GTIN Logistic Unit Depth/Length (nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/depth), Non-GTIN Logistic Unit Width (nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/width), Non-GTIN Logistic Unit Height (nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/height), Non-GTIN Logistic Unit Gross Weight (nonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight), Number of Layers per Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfLayersPerPallet), Number of Units per Layer in a Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer), Count of This Specific Item in a Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and in one iteration of nutritionalProgram class (nutritionalProgramCode equals '8' and nutritionalScore equals 'EXEMPT') then there SHALL be only one iteration of nutritionalProgramCode equal to '8'.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if there is one iteration of the Nutritional Class where Nutritional Program Code (nutritionalProgramCode) equals '8' (Nutri-Score) and Nutritional Score (nutritionalScore) equals 'EXEMPT', then no other iteration of Nutritional Program Code (nutritionalProgramCode) equal to '8' (Nutri-Score) is allowed.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival is used then it SHALL NOT be greater than the smallest minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival of all child items.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Minimum Days of Shelf Life at Arrival (minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival) is used, then it must not be greater than Minimum Days of Shelf Life at Arrival (minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival) of any of its child items.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction is used then it SHALL NOT be greater than the smallest minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction of all child items.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Minimum Days of Shelf Life from Production (minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction) is used, then it must not be greater than Minimum Days of Shelf Life from Production (minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction) of any of its child items.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) equals <gpcCategoryCode GPC Category Name>, then one of the Fruit And Vegetables Grade Of Goods Codes ('EXTRA', 'I', 'II' or 'NONE') must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and referencedFileTypeCode equals ('SAFETY_DATA_SHEET', 'DOP_SHEET' or 'DECLARATION_OF_CONFORMITY') then fileLanguageCode SHALL be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Digital Asset Type Code (referencedFileTypeCode) is equal to 'SAFETY_DATA_SHEET', 'DOP_SHEET' or 'DECLARATION_OF_CONFORMITY', then File Language Code (fileLanguageCode) must be used.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and referencedFileTypeCode equals 'PRODUCT_IMAGE' then uniformResourceIdentifier SHALL begin with ('http://' or 'https://').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Digital Asset Type Code (referencedFileTypeCode) equals 'PRODUCT_IMAGE', then Digital Asset Link (uniformResourceIdentifier) must begin with 'http://' or 'https://'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') and child item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode does not equal ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') then child item platformTypeCode SHALL NOT be used.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', then child item's Pallet Type Code (platformTypeCode) must not be used unless child item Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and certificationIdentification is used and certificationAgency equals 'Additional_Label_Information' then certificationIdentification SHALL equal a code value used for (packagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode or localPackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCodeReference).
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Additional Label Information is used, then Certification Identification (certificationIdentification) must equal a code used for Third Party Accreditation Symbol on Product Package Code (packagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode) or Local Packaging Marked Label Accreditation Code (localPackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCodeReference).

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) equals <gpcCategoryCode GPC Category Name>, then regulationTypeCode must equal 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator must equal 'TRUE' or 'NOT_APPLICABLE'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and hasDisplayReadyPackaging equals 'TRUE' then isTradeItemADespatchUnit SHALL equal 'true'.
Rule.Message: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Display Ready Packaging (hasDisplayReadyPackaging) equals 'TRUE', then Despatch Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) SHALL equal 'true'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' then one iteration of importClassificationTypeCode SHALL equal to ('INTRASTAT' or 'TARIF_INTEGRE_DE_LA_COMMUNAUTE').
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one iteration of Customs Classification Type Code (importClassificationTypeCode) must equal 'INTRASTAT' or 'TARIF_INTEGRE_DE_LA_COMMUNAUTE'.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and importClassificationTypeCode equals ('INTRASTAT', 'TARIF_INTEGRE_DE_LA_COMMUNAUTE' or 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER') and importClassificationValue starts with ('010221', '010229', '0901', '1201', '120710', '120810', '1507', '1511', '1801', '1802', '1803', '1804', '1805', '1806', '2304' or '230660') then at least one iteration of regulationTypeCode SHALL equal 'DEFORESTATION_REGULATION' and isTradeItemRegulationCompliant SHALL equal 'TRUE' in the same iteration.
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) <importClassificationValue value>, attribute Regulation Type Code (regulationTypeCode) must equal 'DEFORESTATION_REGULATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator (isTradeItemRegulationCompliant) must equal 'TRUE' in the same iteration.

Rule.Name: CatalogueItemNotification
Rule.Rule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and importClassificationTypeCode equals ('INTRASTAT', 'TARIF_INTEGRE_DE_LA_COMMUNAUTE' or 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER') and importClassificationValue starts with ('0201', '0202', '020610', '020622', '020629', '151321', '151329', '160250', '290545', '291570', '291590', '382311', '382312', '382319', '382370', '4001', '4005', '4006', '4007', '4008', '4010', '4011', '4012', '4013', '4015', '4016', '4017', '4101', '4104', '4107', '4401', '4402', '4403', '4404', '4405', '4406', '4407', '4408', '4409', '4410', '4411', '4412', '4413', '4414', '4415', '4416', '4417', '4418', '4419', '4420', '4421', '47', '48', '49', '9401', '940330', '940340', '940350', '940360', '940391' or '940610') then at least one iteration of regulationTypeCode SHALL equal 'DEFORESTATION_REGULATION' and isTradeItemRegulationCompliant SHALL equal 'TRUE' or 'NOT_APPLICABLE' in the same iteration.​
Rule.Message: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) <importClassificationValue value>, attribute Regulation Type Code (regulationTypeCode) must equal 'DEFORESTATION_REGULATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator (isTradeItemRegulationCompliant) must equal 'TRUE' or 'NOT_APPLICABLE' in the same iteration.​
